comments.body: Usually, we use `SymTransformer` to change symbol denotations. I think here it's fine to do so as the change is not supposed to be visible in a separately compiled module.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@    val annotations = tree.symbol.annotations
    if (!annotations.isEmpty) then
      tree.symbol.annotations = aggregateAnnotations(tree.symbol.annotations)
    tree
